quote: Emptiness which is conceptually liable to be mistaken for sheer nothingness is in fact the reservoir of infinite possibilities.
author: Daisetsu Suzuki

quote: The idea of Zen is to catch life as it flows.
author: Daisetsu Suzuki

quote: When a thing is denied, the very denial involves something not denied.
author: Daisetsu Suzuki

quote: Life is an art, and like perfect art it should be self-forgetting.
author: Daisetsu Suzuki

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
author: Buddha

quote: If a traveller does not meet with one who is his better, or his equal, let him firmly keep to his solitary journey.
author: Buddha

quote: If one conquers himself, he is the greatest of conquerors.
author: Buddha

quote: What appears as imperfect is the manifestation of the perfect.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Many of us have been running all our lives. Practice stopping
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Every thought you produce, anything you say, any action you do, it bears your signature.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Too lazy to be ambitious, I let the world take care of itself.
author: Ryokan

quote: If there is beauty, there must be ugliness. Wisdom and ignorance are complementary.
author: Ryokan

quote: How could we discuss this and that without knowing the whole world is reflected in a single pearl?
author: Ryokan

quote: He never preached or exhorted, but his life radiated purity and joy, he was a living sermon.
author: Ryokan

quote: If you cannot find the truth right where you are, where else do you expect to find it?
author: Dogen Zenji

quote: Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
author: Dogen Zenji

quote: The whole Moon and the entire Sky is reflected in one dew drop on the grass.
author: Dogen Zenji

quote: To study Buddhism is to study ourselves. To study ourselves is to forget ourselves.
author: Dogen Zenji

quote: Enlightenment is intimacy with all things
author: Dogen Zenji

quote: I travel in this limitless world, where every step I take is my home.
author: Dogen Zenji
